author: dfabulich
msg: [DBUTILS-14] [DBUTILS-31] [DBUTILS-39] [DBUTILS-41] [DBUTILS-44] setNull problems with Postgres and Oracle.

With this change, we now attempt to use ParameterMetaData.getParameterType to determine the SQL type of a null parameter.  On Oracle, this will fail, so we'll try it once (at most), and record the failure in a volatile boolean so we won't try it again unnecessarily.

msg: as reported in the mailinglist, lookups now working

msg: Rework the recent changes to Asset to keep the Asset interface unchanged and introduce a sub-interface, Asset2.
